website_summaries.verdict: If you want a basic, budget model, this may be the best choice for you. Otherwise, consider others on our shortlist.
pros: Offers a basic design with risers that are rugged and simple to stack
cons: It's a bit bulky compared to others we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve used this step one time for les mills body step and 30 mins into the workout it cracks super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Broke and injured my leg after a few weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine with this step for me for a few weeks. Then one day, the plastic suddenly cracked and broke and I went right through the hole scraping and cutting my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Melnick

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it or buy it again and wish i could ...
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt to put on/off risers. Does not support weight very well. I am 150 lbs and when I stand on it, it bows in the middle. It also sways from front to back when your on top of it. Also there is no "anti slip grip" on the surface. Huge bummer because I have actually slipped on it because its so slippery on top. I wouldn't recommend it or buy it again and wish i could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stepping it up a notch
customer_reviews.text: I like this stepper but I wish it was wider. I knew the dimensions when I purchased it but still decided to get it. The risers are easy to attach and they are very sturdy. I had a stepper back in the 80's and it was like double the width so it was easy to stay on and not get tripped up on. But all in all it fits the purpose and I'm glad to be back in the "stepping game"!
customer_reviews.author: Suze Q

customer_reviews.title: My use is unusual - read on
customer_reviews.text: I have pain both my knees, I could not independantly lift my left leg into the car for several months (used a leg lifter and 2 stools) and now need knee surgery on my right and cannot get into an suv. I tried footstools - small and too high if bought for my weight Then - I had this GREAT idea when watching an infomercial. Buy an exercise step which is adjustable and for my weight to get in and out of a car. THIS HAS BEEN A BLESSING. I also now have one to use at work - have to sit on a bar stool and by putting my feet on this step, I can stay on it.
customer_reviews.author: tutorl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust size - great for PT after knee replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 30" because I don't have great balance & needed the length. I'm glad I did. It's easy to adjust the height between the 3 options. I bought this to strengthen my knee after total knee replacement so being able to start on the lowest option & work my way up was great. I never could have used it without that option. I left it in the kitchen & did a certain amount of repetetions each time I was in the kitchen. This allowed me to do fewer at a time & still get the same number needed for the day. That also worked well immediately after surgery since just a few steps was very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Next :(
customer_reviews.text: If you are a heavy set person, do not , i repeat do not perform high intensity work outs on the center. I am currently on the market for another stepper unfortunately. Plus you definitely need a matt underneath as it does not grip. Weight capicity says 500lbs, i was very confident as im 200lbs less than their weight capacity. Wonder if i would be able to return as i was actually havig fun working out with a stepper
customer_reviews.author: yasmin

customer_reviews.title: No storage at 6 inch height
customer_reviews.text: I am post total knee replacement and I am using it for training the new knee to go up steps with full weight bearing. It's a very good exercise device and is sturdy and wide. BUT: When I graduated from 4 inches to 6 inches, the remaining pieces do not fit underneath for storage. I have to keep them outside the device. This is not an acceptable solution.
customer_reviews.author: G.S. Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Not to my standard
customer_reviews.text: Two big reasons why I'm not satisfied with this purchase. One, the detachable steps fall off easily during transportation from home to gym. Two, the plastic pieces at the bottom of the step that are supposed to prevent the step from sliding on hard surfaces aren't very useful. As I placed the step on the hardwood floor, it slid as I stepped on it to test it out. It stays put best on carpet. I have experience with aerobics steps, this particular one I do not like.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic!! Attempted a simple plyometric exercise and already ...
customer_reviews.text: Aerobic Stepper is very weak in the middle. Can barely support weight of an individual standing on one leg at 185lbs. Pathetic!! Attempted a simple plyometric exercise and already a piece has broken from the base. Very uncertain about ability to sustain weight. Durability also a question mark. Lastly, the four stepping pieces don't attach to the base very well, thus making easy storage a problem. Better to leave steps on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend more for better quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: The price was good for this step, but it feels flimsy and scoots a bit during step classes. I can feel it give, and it would only be a matter of time before it busts. I am returning this and spending a bit more for the Reebok step that I have used in the gym. Injuries cost a lot more than the price difference of an extra step. Also, using as a weight bench, this step is too short.
customer_reviews.author: West1

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Product was affordable especially for the height change options and the overall traditional size of stepper. I’m a little concerned that I occasionally hear creaking and cracking noises when I step up during my exercise sessions. I’ve turned the box over several times to see if there are any cracks in the step, and to make sure I have it assembled correctly, but I can’t seem to get to heart of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: CanadaEdu

customer_reviews.title: Great for step exercises from physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: I recently finished physical therapy for an achilles tendon injury. One of my exercises is to go up and down one stair, flexing the tendon and extending it. That'd be great... if I had stairs. Enter the aerobic step! I use it to do the exercises, and it's great. Best part is, you can set how high you want it. I'm pretty short, so just use one of the stackers. The others store neatly in the bottom of the step. It's very cleverly made. And, it's tough. I do not hold back putting my full weight on it, and it doesn't give an inch.
customer_reviews.author: J. BurnettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use it cracked right in the middle. Not durable as expected nor advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price ... not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I do like this Aerobic Step Platform, but when it arrived it already had a small crack in one of the corners. I didn't bother to return it because of social distancing and it has been working fine, but I'm sure it won't last too long. It does the job for now and seems like an ok buy for such a low price. The shipment came on time though!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper step to use for some fitness exercises for my dog as well as myself. I don't need to use it often so didn't want to invest in a large one/better quality. Unfortunately, you get what you pay for. The reviews stating that the legs fall off is accurate. It's a GREAT concept, to stash the legs underneath and conserve storage space, but unfortunately, wasn't constructed well enough. Also, the surface is slicker than preferable as it's just stamped plastic and not some sort of rubbery/grippy surface.
customer_reviews.author: FastDog

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged right out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this the other day and came as expected abut right out of the box a big chunk of the side wall was broken off. not happy with that. this was either during shipping or it came from the factory like this. Very Disappointing if Khols was open I would take this back today and return it but given the situation with the quarantine that is not possible and returning will be a big hassle. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a very inespensive step, duo this review bears that in mind. If you are a fairly light individual this is a solid step. However if you are a large person trying to become small, keep looking. This step does not seem stable for a person of my size. For context I am 6'4" 300+lbs the product claims to be rated foe someone my size, but I am uncertain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very good stepper. Very sturdy and works well on all ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good stepper. Very sturdy and works well on all surfaces. I have never had a problem with slippage. However, I would recommend using very good tennis shoes or having some form of handles for stability if necessary. But then again safety first always!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: They should remarket as an RV step
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as an adjustable height step to get in and out of our RV when parked on a sloped campsite. Works great for this purpose and is a lot cheaper than the steps that are sold for that purpose. Would be nice if the bottoms of the pads were a solid surface, but I put a piece of rubber under them to keep them from sinking into any soft ground conditions. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home
customer_reviews.text: Needed a taller step for home and this works great because you can adjust height. Love it for my lunges and use it in my front room while I watch tv. Price was very reasonable and arrived sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer in Norcal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to change heights. I am doing my workouts virtually with my trainer and this gives more variety in exercises. I weigh about 280 pounds and it appears to be sturdy enough for my purposes. Only hD it a couple of weeks so I can’t speak about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable heights and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had a total knee replacement and this stepper is just what I need to add to my daily exercises. It is similar to the one they have at physical therapy. I love that it has the 3 different heights so I can ease into stairs and it’s sturdy. I live in a ranch style home with no steps so I really need the extra exercise there.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie

customer_reviews.title: Slides a little  but good product
customer_reviews.text: This step slides a little on wood floor for certain moves. A well placed yoga mat fixes it. Design problem. When you only use one set of risers, the others can't be stored underneath. I bought the 31 inch step and I'm 5'2". Wish I had bought a shorter one. When I'm crossing over the step, I have a hard time clearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect width, height
customer_reviews.text: Perfect width, height, and construction for home use and storage. I do not recommend it for anyone over 200 pounds though as it will flex.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for body pump
customer_reviews.text: I use this bench for body pump and it’s perfect for it! Lightweight but sturdy. Perfect addition to my “home gym”
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Got this for transform 20 and it's working just fine
customer_reviews.author: amanda_jlh

customer_reviews.title: Descent
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I like that it has 3 leves. It’s seem to be durable, but I’m also Petit and skinny. I place it on my carpet, so it stays, maybe on hardwood floor not, just use a mat. One thing I would complain is that is not wide enough for steps. When I do chasse or something on the step, my foot slips down, not all the time but I have to be careful
customer_reviews.author: Olumide O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Step
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy and flexible. A good price, too. My only complaint, if I had to make one, was that doing pushups or burpees off of this thing can wear on your hands a bit due to the non-slip surface. You'll likely run into that with others, though, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kiely582

customer_reviews.title: A Step Up In The Right Direction.
customer_reviews.text: Don't over spend on equipment, this step is perfect for all of my needs at a fraction of the cost of the others. Fed ex dropped it off and I removed it from it's box and started using imedeadeatly. Three different hieght levels for my advancement in my Physical Therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves her stepper so much. Very lightweight and easily stores under a dresser or bed to be out of the way when not in use. Different levels store under the step surface also. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great help with my mobility after surgery
customer_reviews.text: My flexibility in my surgery leg is improving with use. I have graduated to the second level and appreciate the broad landing surface and steady base as I go through my exercises.This also helps with my balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's light, mobile and adjustable, but ... When one picks it up, some of the leg units fall off. Then there starts a contest of attaching the legs, pushing for them to connect, twisting over the unit to its upright position without one of the leg units falling off. Once properly supported, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and two of the grey blocks/layers whatever you called them was broken. I really dislike paying to received something broken, what am supposed to do ??... glue them ??!! I
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: The stability on product and price range is GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had bought two sets from bcg, but they were not secure...and let me tell you, this aerobic steps from Amazon are soooooooooooo strongly made and I strongly recommend this product. I just bought two sets to make one out of two, do to the intensity of my workouts and I absolutely Loooooooove it. Will purchase two more sets...the delivery was free and super fast. Thank you!!! 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Glendy Marin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, step didn’t latch together safely
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged and company was difficult to work with to secure a replacement. It arrived with a piece missing from the plastic step portion, which didn’t allow the product to latch properly which would cause serious injury in a workout routine. After a series of long winded emails, they finally sent a replacement but after much headache.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Louw

customer_reviews.title: Solid Equipment
customer_reviews.text: I am using the step daily, as part of a rehab regimen following knee surgery. The equipment is well-constructed, very stable, and can be broken down into easily stored or transported components.
customer_reviews.author: Howard G. Anders Jr

customer_reviews.title: Produt broke in half
customer_reviews.text: This didn't get much use until recently and broke in half during use. Owning to the adage "you get what you pay for," it seems the price confirms this is a product that is neither sturdy or durable. Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Sachartoff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: The steps really add a lot to the workout but the base needs improvement on the non-slip aspect. We have to place them on yoga mats, because the rubber feet do not prevent the steps from moving on wood or tile flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog and he has issues getting onto the couch, this allows him to get that little extra boost up and down so he can chill out during his older years
customer_reviews.author: Doug3815

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It works well with the program I’m doing although the extenders that hide underneath the step always fall out, but I guess you could just take them off and store somewhere else, otherwise great step for any step workout
customer_reviews.author: melinda french

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect for work at home workouts. I am a historical stepper and also do the 30 minute Express workout at planet fitness. I set up a similar station with my new bench!
customer_reviews.author: SCAP

customer_reviews.title: Decent but a little unsturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the step for the price, but if you want to do any workout that would focus on the middle of the step it will tip over. Just have to watch your foot placement.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: It Broke!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have been using this for a little while and it all of a sudden cracked down the middle during use. Very disappointed, and the return period is up.
customer_reviews.author: Yossi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: small not made for lying on
customer_reviews.text: okay for a step stool not made to use for bench press (i'm 5 foot and my head was hanging off) the risers are not steady - for one okay but for two may not stick very well it's like a peg through a hole to latch on... Okay for just using as a step stool or no risers for doing step aerobics... if needing to put body on for a chest press, go with a 43' inch top. Decent for a step stool not for all forms of working out.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased these steps! Unable to exercise to the degree I once did as a result of my health issues, this allows me to work my mobility at a "low impact" basis.
customer_reviews.author: Je' Vous Amie Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Just like one at Gym
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed step platform at gym and thought having one at home would be nice. Easy to adjust, stable, and sturdy. Arrived on time and would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: This is simply too small.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is much smaller than I expected. I struggled by using it for a few months and then eventually bought a "The Step" full sized step.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable risers are easy to stack and the step itself is lightweight and easy to move around. I weigh 130lbs and I feel stable when stepping up on it.
customer_reviews.author: rangerprato

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this product hands down over the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this product hands down over the original gym step but it fails miserably on functionality! It's too short, too narrow and the step slides during use. It's a safety hazard and I do not recommend this product. The product team gets an A+ for looks but they need to go back to production and fix the performance flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't received a refund for this
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I returned this product on 12/10/19 and it reached you on 12/13/19. I haven't received a refund for this. Tracking number 1Z7437Y59078550407 I returned it because my floor is too slippery (waxed wood) so this wasn't stable enough on my floor. But the quality is really good a carpet. it's just that there is no carpet in my room
customer_reviews.author: Amy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: I got this to use a a Step for my closet!
customer_reviews.text: I have tall closets and I can't reach. I was tired of getting out a stepstool, so I bought a step!!! Perfect. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thinking outside the box
customer_reviews.text: This fits a need for a quick fix. We are using this as a remedy for an awkwardly built step outside of our house. It fills the space and makes the step more normal and safer for use. I know this is not its intended use, but it fills the bill for me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken upon opening then box. It’s not sturdy at all and. It worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Marte

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with this item on arrival and wrote a nasty review with 1 star thinking that was the end of it. Two days later I received an apology and a refund that was above and beyond. Thank you Helga. I've gone from a complainer to a big fan as anyone can make mistakes but very few handle it as well as you and your company. I'm impressed and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you’re getting a good product. It does what it’s suppose to do. Pretty happy with the product. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: A bit shorter (with the full stack) than I visualized. And some set of felt feet might be nice -- my wife, trying to sleep, can hear it on our wood floor, and it slides. But satisfied with quality and looks, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sturgis85

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good style, color, size, and well made. stores easily and you can change the height. I love that you don't have to worry about where you may have misplaced the "legs" and the sit right under the base and attach to it. It has held up well after 6+ months of regular use from multiple people. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice is the Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great merchandise and exactly as described. The stepper is very stable. It hasn't been used much yet but I really like it! It looks good, too!
customer_reviews.author: PIRANHA

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy and great design idea regarding the parts that increase it from one size to another.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Long enough for me to bench press on it and high enough to step and work the butt
customer_reviews.author: Lafondules

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hold up to 300lbs for sure!!! It’s nice wide, you won’t loose your balance definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: After adding a mattress topper to an already tall mattress, I need the assistance getting into bed after hip surgery. This provided a nice, sturdy platform that was just the right height for my needs :)
customer_reviews.author: P. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice. To small and not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not a good choice. To small and not durable. We had one class and broke a step right in the middle. The lady it broke on only weights 130 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stepper is nice since it has adjustable heights. You can work your way up to the highest level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: What do you want it’s flat and sturdy enough for a couple of hundred lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty in changing height
customer_reviews.text: Parts that change height from 4 inches to 6 inches don't fit. Not well made. I have to use it only 4 inches high.
customer_reviews.author: Chibitaro

customer_reviews.title: Not just a workout step...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mamie because she needed a step to get into bed after a surgery. She says it's great.
customer_reviews.author: sidetone1

customer_reviews.title: Item is defective
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described, missing an essential part to be able to use it
customer_reviews.author: MothersLove

customer_reviews.title: Did not worked out for me
customer_reviews.text: I sold this item on the FB market as it did not meet my need. The item was way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Aurie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to add this product to our home gym! Very satisfied in the different ways you can use this product
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So far, a great stepper
customer_reviews.text: This stepper seems to be sturdy and the extra parts to make it higher snap easily into place. I am only giving it 4 starts because I have only used it once. I look forward to many years of use, at least, that is my hope.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It need to be placed on a mat due to it won’t stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great find for price
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. Great quality and has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do for exercising, however it does slide around on the carpet and slides around with my yoga mat under it. I feel it should have something on the bottom to prevent it from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: I was able to lay on it and the length supports my whole back when doing bench press for body pump. I am however 5 ft 5 in but it stores nicely and has good height
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Exercise stepper and stepper to get into bed!
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a new bed and it is higher for me to get in. (Yes, i am short) and using this to get into bed. Also had problems with my back so also using this for my stepper what it is originally used for - so I am multi-tasking this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lay

customer_reviews.title: I don't have steps and this is a good way to keep the knees bending and the muscles ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily. I don't have steps and this is a good way to keep the knees bending and the muscles in my legs developing. I do wish it had one more layer up because it is a little too short. Think about adding another layer.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Less than impressed
customer_reviews.text: Main base step broke after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: It's not the best. Just saying I wish I had gotten a differnt one.
customer_reviews.text: This step will do in a pich or of you are already fit. But for me at the beginning of my weight loss journey at 280lbs it creaks a lot and I am afraid that if I use the full height on it, it will snap. It also scoots or shifts under me in mid step.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great Step
customer_reviews.text: This works great, a good surface that isn’t slippy or anything. Perfect for active workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne

customer_reviews.title: You will be satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Good step! Love that is adjustable heights. Confident using it. One surprise was the additional steps fit secretly and compactly under the base for storage. Fits under the bed easily. Fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Castro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice and wide and sturdy. This is a larger step.
customer_reviews.author: Stella & Darleen

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: An excellent addition to my at home gym! Easy to stack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised...
customer_reviews.text: However, the risers that elevate the step to different levels tend to come undone @ the 8" level. Just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mom On A Mission

customer_reviews.title: I've been doing step for 20 years at the gymbut ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing step for 20 years at the gymbut I recently decided to try it at home as well. This step works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Happy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It has two different options to add to the step-so three height options all together.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Croston

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last longer than 2 months. Cracked at top made it unsafe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good for step ups and step over!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Good height with added levels. The only thing is that they added stands don’t always stay connected when stored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great steps!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 5th wheel camper to use as steps. Works out great!! Non slip and we can make steps as high or as low as we need them. Works great for our little dog or grandchild to step up into camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause it was skinnier than most other steppers, but it cracked after the first few workouts of Les Mill Grit. Not sturdy whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe Way to Exercise
customer_reviews.text: This step is exactly like the one in my physical therapist’s office. Since I have no stairs in my apartment, it allows me to do the assigned exercises in between sessions - and to do them safely! I am very happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Bruck

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable as it should be
customer_reviews.text: Good product although the connectors can easily move off one another/not as stable as it should be
customer_reviews.author: Ame Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this since i got it, very sturdy and stable. Definitely a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Great to decrease height of first stair tread.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly whit I needed to assist someone in getting into truck when too weak for stairs. Only problem is that the 4 pieces to increase height keep falling out of storage area under stepper, somewhat annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Betz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the height and durability of it...the way the risers nestle underneath is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Prolific

customer_reviews.title: Step Platform
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased about my 3 level step platform! You can adjust it from the connectors at the bottom of the step. there are 4. You can stack them on the other ones when you want to improve for more of a challenge! Thanks, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable step board
customer_reviews.text: Height is adjustable. Fine for me and I am 94.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Withstands the workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for workouts. It was so much cheaper than ordering for a company and withstood good step workouts
customer_reviews.author: Jess Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as part of my workout routine. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: c.allen

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 30in Height-Adjustable Aerobic Step Platform Exercise Accessory w/ 3 Levels, Non-Slip Surface
product_meta.description:
Burn calories, tone muscles, and step into a healthier lifestyle! This aerobic step platform is the perfect workout accessory for cardio, HIIT, and plyometric workout to define the glutes, abdominals, and legs. A non-slip, non-stick, shock-absorbing surface ensures safety while working. With 3 different heights, every lunge, jump, and squat can have a different level of difficulty that will help to challenge and push every workout. From the comfort of home to the gym, take the step platform anywhere to achieve all your fitness goals. 

SPECIFICATIONS: 
Overall Dimensions: 30”(L) x 10.6”(W) x 3.5”(H) 
Riser: 11.8”(L) x 3.9”(W) x 2”(H) (each) 
Weight Capacity: 550 lbs. 
Weight: 8.8 lbs. 
Material: PVC Plastic 
No assembly required
feature_bullets: VERSATILE FITNESS ACCESSORY: Perfect for HIIT, cardio, and plyometric exercises or with additional weights for a total body workout
CUSTOMIZED WORKOUT: 3 different height adjustments at 4, 6, and 8 inches will help you to intensify every workout and push yourself to reach new fitness heights
SAFE AND STABLE: A non-slip, non-stick, shock-absorbing surface ensures that the platform stays in place and withstands the pressure of every lunge, pushup, and sit-up
PORTABLE EXERCISE: Keep it in your bedroom or garage for an at-home workout, or take it with you to the gym or studio to participate in a group step class
DURABLE: Constructed of strong plastic material for a reliable fitness tool; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 30"(L) x 10.6"(W) x 3.5"(H); Weight Capacity: 550 lbs.
